channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Fast Datapath for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Fast Datapath for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8

item.title: CVE-2024-2182|2024-08-02T19:17:11.246Z -- red%20hat -- fast%20datapath%20for%20red%20hat%20enterprise%20linux%208
item.description: A flaw was found in the Open Virtual Network (OVN). In OVN clusters where BFD is used between hypervisors for high availability, an attacker can inject specially crafted BFD packets from inside unprivileged workloads, including virtual machines or containers, that can trigger a denial of service.
